title: inLight Radio v1.3.5.0 + portable
description:
inLight Radio  Features:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A simple radio player for streaming music from the internet!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Implemented Bass into radio, copyright by Un4seen Developments.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Implemented LAME encoder into radio, copyrighted by The LAME Project.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatically cycles through the current station sources till one is playable
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Over 18,000 radio stations in the database and counting
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You can easily record what you're listening to (record current track only, record all, record track from beginning)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ It has a 14 different spectrum analyzers that can be changed by left & right mouse clicks
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ It has a huge database, and stations can be added by the user
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ It will show album artwork cover if available (save the album image to a file)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Writes artwork image and all tags possible into the recorded file
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You can right click on the album artwork and purchase the mp3 download or album from Amazon
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ It will show the track lyrics if available (you can save the lyrics to a text file)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ It can hide in the system tray while playing music
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ It has a volume control and buffer status
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ It has 4 EQ presets Jazz, Pop, Rock, and Classic
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Manage your favorite radio stations, play, add, edit and delete
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play URL's from websites etc...
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ It has the option to crossfade between stations
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Go back and view your playback history to play, clear one, or clear them all
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add your own stations to the radio (unlimited)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatically check for new program versions and stations updates
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Built in sleep timer that will stop playback, close the radio or even shutdown the PC!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ There is 4 list views in the radio Show all stations, Show my stations, Show my favorites, Show my history
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Easily adjust the time in begin/end of recordings
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Hotkeys for Start/Stop playing, Mute/Unmute, Start/Stop recording, Adjust volume up & down, Next & Previous stations, Show/Hide window
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Scroll station title + description + artist + track title in title bar
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Its ad and spyware free, and very easy to use

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Requirements: Windows Xp .NET Framework v4 / Vista / Win7



Supported Stream Types:

Shoutcast and Icecast MP3; Icecast OGG Vorbis; WMA; AAC
